parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.60

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable the new [https://forums.bistudio.com/topic/191515-ai-driving-feedback-topic/ AI driving], used to test the old and new AI driving.

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> state: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[useAISteeringComponent]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[sendSimpleCommand]], [[enableAI]], [[disableAI]], [[enableAIFeature]], [[vehicleMoveInfo]]
